CustomField.description: When set to TRUE, if the 'Hide Timesheet Manager Add Transaction' setting within the TimeCards Config custom setting is set to TRUE, the user will be able to use the Add button to add transactions to a Timesheet
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set to TRUE, if the 'Hide Timesheet Manager Add Transaction' setting within the TimeCards Config custom setting is set to TRUE, the user will be able to use the Add button to add transactions to a Timesheet
CustomField.label: Enable Timesheet Manager Add Transaction
